General.Name: Silkroad Visual Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Silkroad Visual Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a digital vision services business in China. It engages in digital Integrated exhibition and display; digital content application; smart city, digital twin, AR/VR/MR interactive digital content solution business, and cloud rendering business. The company also offers process service and solutions for digital creative design, content production, and visual presentation. It offers product and services for urban planning halls, theme exhibition halls, museums, corporate image promotion, large-scale celebrations, urban city image display, design visualization, high-end real estate marketing, digital twin, smart city, virtual simulation, digital cultural tourism, and other fields, as well as VR+K12 standardization test, vocational education, intelligent manufacturing, and smart park applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
